name: Slightly Better
description:
In this cyberpunk city, A.L.L.P.O.L. is the ruling party, fully controlled by corporations and running a foolproof propaganda machine. But some people started an alternative, a party name Slightly Better, to overcome A.L.L.P.O.L. in the upcoming elections.

You were contacted by a mysterious informant to help them win the elections by hacking the databases of A.I.-generated news outlets, and use propaganda for the common good. Fight fire with fire, as they said.

Controls
  • Arrow Keys: move your character while hacking
  • Mouse: left click to interact with the environment and change text prompts while hacking
Softwares & ressources
  • Godot 3.3
  • Krita
  • Tracktion Waveform
  • Font: https://www.dafont.com/perfect-dos-vga-437.font
Credits

Video game made for Godot Wild Jam 33!

  • Coding, implementation: Hyblis29
  • Graphics, Sound, Game Design: Klosenlinks

Thanks for playing!

Source code
